meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of the depth of bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: The bathymetrical survey helped us understand the lake's depth.
meanings.sent2: Her bathymetrical skills were crucial for mapping the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetrical tools made the underwater exploration more exciting.
meanings.sent4: His bathymetrical knowledge plunged deeper than the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetrical data painted a vivid picture of the underwater world.

meanings.definition: Involving the study of underwater topography.
meanings.sent1: The bathymetrical research focused on mapping the ocean's features.
meanings.sent2: Their bathymetrical expedition revealed hidden underwater landscapes.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetrical project turned exploring the seabed into a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her bathymetrical expertise uncovered the secrets of the underwater world.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetrical analysis provided a clear view of the ocean's topography.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the depth of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent1: The bathymetrical data showed the varying depths of the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Their bathymetrical equipment allowed them to explore the seabed.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetrical expedition made diving into ocean depths seem easy.
meanings.sent4: His bathymetrical expertise helped in understanding the ocean's depth.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetrical measurements revealed the mysteries of the deep sea.
